revised_title: Letter on Variations of the Magnetical Inclination: Prof. Hansteen's Observations and Requests for Additional Data
tldr: Prof. Hansteen writes to Col. Sabine about his calculations of magnetic inclination formulae for various locations in Europe. He discusses the annual variation of the magnetical inclination and the approaching dip to a minimum. Hansteen requests more recent observations from other scientists, including those from London, to improve the accuracy of his calculations.
